title: gazebo crash when running long time

content.raw:
Looking for help!

Im using Gazebo 2.2.3 in ubuntu 14.04 LTS in VMWare. 

I add some indoor scene models and kinect models. I use ROS topic to get simulated color and depth images. And I use ROS services to get/set kinect positions. It works well. 

But when Gazebo running long time(about 2 hours), sometimes it will crash, or cause ubuntu GUI crash, and get simulated frames don't match the kinect poses.

Whats wrong with it? Can you help me solve the problem? Thanks in advance!
content.html:
